nodes.text: "One Thousand Levels Down" is a canon short story which is included in Star Wars Insider 151. It is written by Alexander Freed and is illustrated by Joe Corroney and Brian Miller.
Two Alderaanians flee Imperial persecution on Coruscant following The Disaster.
Author Alexander Freed pitched the story to Del Rey. He wanted to tell the "street-level view" of the destruction of Alderaan.
